inputs.value: All users can write to the affected bucket
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket has permissions (ACL) which let all users write to the bucket.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the entry from the bucket permissions that allows everyone to write.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: All users can write the bucket ACP / ACL
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket has permissions (ACP / ACL) which let all users modify the permissions.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the entry from the bucket permissions that allows everyone to edit permissions.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: All users can list the affected bucket
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket has permissions (ACL) which let anyone list the bucket contents.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the entry from the bucket permissions that allows everyone to list the bucket.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: All authenticated AWS users can write to the affected bucket
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket has permissions (ACL) which let any AWS users write to the bucket.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the entry from the bucket permissions that allows 'Any Authenticated AWS User' to write.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: All authenticated AWS users can read the affected bucket
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket has permissions (ACL) which let any AWS user list the bucket contents.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the entry from the bucket permissions that allows 'Any Authenticated AWS User' to list the bucket.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: All authenticated AWS users can change bucket permissions
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket has permissions ( ACP / ACL) which let any AWS user modify the permissions.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the bucket permissions (ACP / ACL) that allows 'Any Authenticated AWS User' to edit permissions.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: S3 bucket logging has not been enabled for the affected resource.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Enable logging on your S3 buckets.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: Bucket policy gives world Put permission
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket policy allows the world to put data into the affected bucket.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove the bucket permission that enables the world to put (and overwrite) data in this bucket.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: Bucket policy uses IP addresses to grant permission
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket policy grants permissions to any user at an IP address or range to perform operations on objects in the specified bucket.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Consider using other methods to grant permission to perform operations on your S3 buckets.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: Bucket policy gives world Get permission
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket policy allows the world to get the contents of the affected bucket.
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove or modify the bucket policy that enables the world to get the contents of this bucket.
inputs.name: suggested_action

inputs.value: Bucket policy gives world List permission
inputs.name: display_name

inputs.value: Bucket policy allows the world to list the contents of the affected bucket
inputs.name: description

inputs.value: Remove or modify the bucket policy that enables the world to list the contents of this bucket.
inputs.name: suggested_action
